WRITING.TITLE: SS through quick join...
WRITING.TEXT: Anyone else having problems joining SS through the quick join menu? 2nd day now same problem. It #8217;s a ball ache having to travel to the icon on the menu to get a game started. Sent a tweet to R* support will probably reply with a shitty trouble shooting reply #128580;

WRITING.TITLE: Absolutely in love with the new update #128525;
WRITING.TEXT: Shit post I know but wanted to show my love for what #8217;s been done! RDR2O just got an adrenaline shot to its heart!!!!

WRITING.TEXT: With it being nerfed does it still have a space in your PVP build? Or have you dropped it completely now?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone still having problems joining large showdown series?
WRITING.TEXT: Looks like I #8217;m searching for updates, then rebuilding my database again in a to get this working again. Why come out of Beta if so many people are still having the same problems? Blue screen etc etc...
